title: Between FY 2020 and FY 2024, what was the change in the percentage of CVS Health (NYSE: CVS) Pharmacy and Consumer Wellness revenues made from operations excluding "pharmacy"? Express the answer as a percentage rounded to two decimal points of precision.
description:
1. Find the percent of CVS Pharmacy & Consumer Wellness revenues made from non-pharmacy operations in FY 2020. Using CVS's FY 2020 10-K, making sure to use Retail/LTC (predecessor to Pharmacy & Consumer Wellness): front store and other = 23.1%. 
 
 2. Find the percent of CVS Pharmacy & Consumer Wellness revenues made from non-pharmacy operations in FY 2024. Using CVS's FY 2024 10-K: front store and other = 19.1%. 
 
 3. Compute the change in CVS Pharmacy & Consumer Wellness revenues made from non-pharmacy operations (FY 2024 minus FY 2020): 19.1% - 23.1% = -4.00%.

rubric.criteria: Find FY2020 non-pharmacy (front store and other) percentage = 23.1% (Retail/LTC predecessor per FY2020 10-K)
Find FY2024 non-pharmacy (front store and other) percentage = 19.1% (Pharmacy & Consumer Wellness per FY2024 10-K)
Final answer rounded to two decimal places
